languages.text: Почему они перестали нас бить? И воду дали... Где подвох?
"Почему они перестали нас бить? И воду дали... Это какая-то новая пытка надеждой?"
"Why'd they stop beating us? They even gave us water... Is this some new enforcer trick? Hope torture?"
languages.original_text: "Почему они перестали нас бить? И воду дали... Это какая-то новая пытка надеждой?"

traits.locale_text: "Why'd they stop beating us? They even gave us water... Is this some new enforcer trick? Hope torture?"
"Why'd they stop beating us? They even gave us water... Is this some new enforcer trick? Hope torture?"
"Why'd they stop beating us? They even gave us water... Is this some new enforcer trick? Hope torture?"
"Why'd they stop beating us? They even gave us water... Is this some new enforcer trick? Hope torture?"
"Why'd they stop beating us? They even gave us water... Is this some new enforcer trick? Hope torture?"
"Why'd they stop beating us? They even gave us water... Is this some new enforcer trick? Hope torture?"

languages.text: « Pourquoi ils ont arrêté de nous tabasser ? Ils nous ont même donné de l'eau... C'est encore une de leurs ruses ? J'ai bien peur qu'ils nous réservent un tour pendable. »
languages.original_text: "Why'd they stop beating us? They even gave us water... Is this some new enforcer trick? Hope torture?"

traits.locale_text: « Pourquoi ils ont arrêté de nous tabasser ? Ils nous ont même donné de l'eau... C'est encore une de leurs ruses ? J'ai bien peur qu'ils nous réservent un tour pendable. »

languages.text: «¿Por qué han dejado de darnos palizas? Hasta nos han dado agua... ¿Es un nuevo truco de los guardias? ¿Tortura de esperanza?».
languages.original_text: "Why'd they stop beating us? They even gave us water... Is this some new enforcer trick? Hope torture?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Por qué han dejado de darnos palizas? Hasta nos han dado agua... ¿Es un nuevo truco de los guardias? ¿Tortura de esperanza?».

languages.text: “他们怎么不打我们了？还给我们水喝……这是什么新的审讯手段吗？用希望来折磨我们？”
languages.original_text: "Why'd they stop beating us? They even gave us water... Is this some new enforcer trick? Hope torture?"

traits.locale_text: “他们怎么不打我们了？还给我们水喝……这是什么新的审讯手段吗？用希望来折磨我们？”

languages.text: 「何故彼らは私達を殴らないんだ？水さえもくれたんだ…これはエンフォーサーの新しい企みか？希望の拷問か？」
languages.original_text: "Why'd they stop beating us? They even gave us water... Is this some new enforcer trick? Hope torture?"

traits.locale_text: 「何故彼らは私達を殴らないんだ？水さえもくれたんだ…これはエンフォーサーの新しい企みか？希望の拷問か？」

languages.text: "Warum haben sie aufgehört, uns zu verprügeln? Sie haben uns sogar Wasser gegeben ... Ist das eine neue List der Enforcer? Folter durch Hoffnung?"
languages.original_text: "Why'd they stop beating us? They even gave us water... Is this some new enforcer trick? Hope torture?"

traits.locale_text: "Warum haben sie aufgehört, uns zu verprügeln? Sie haben uns sogar Wasser gegeben ... Ist das eine neue List der Enforcer? Folter durch Hoffnung?"

languages.text: "Neden bizi dövmeyi bıraktılar? Su bile verdiler... Yeni bir infazcı numarası mı bu? Umutla mı işkenceye başladılar?"
languages.original_text: "Why'd they stop beating us? They even gave us water... Is this some new enforcer trick? Hope torture?"
